quotes.content: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.content: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.
quotes.author: Joe Sparano

quotes.content: Design adds value faster than it adds costs.
quotes.author: Joel Spolsky

quotes.content: The details are not the details. They make the design.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.content: Every great design begins with an even better story.
quotes.author: Lorinda Mamo

quotes.content: User experience is not about the inner workings of a product but rather how it works on the outside.
quotes.author: Steve Krug
